definition: to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

sentences.chinese: 您孩提時代的乳名是什麼？

sentences.english: I, in turn, kept trying to relive my childhood.
sentences.chinese: 相反，我則在不斷試圖重溫我的孩提時代。

sentences.english: During his childhood, he sang in church with his parents.
sentences.chinese: 孩提期間，他與怙恃一路在教堂裏唱歌。

sentences.english: When Thoreau wrote that line, he was thinking of the Walden Pond he knew as a boy.
sentences.chinese: 寫這句話時，梭羅想起孩提時代的瓦爾登湖。

sentences.english: As kids, my friends and I never bothered with plans.
sentences.chinese: 在我的孩提時代，我和我的朋友從不爲計劃發愁。

sentences.english: The only two books I remember from early childhood were both Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 我唯一記得的孩提時代的兩本書就是關於中國的。

sentences.english: His problem began when he was a child.
sentences.chinese: 他的這個問題起始於孩提時代。

sentences.english: I haven't seen my best friend from childhood in yonks!
sentences.chinese: 我很久都沒有看到我孩提時的好朋友了。

sentences.english: Has any boyhood dream ever been fulfilled?I must doubt it. Look at Brander Matthews.
sentences.chinese: 好像沒有什麼人成就了孩提時代的夢想。

sentences.english: Hour of early childhood, she have never dream of the television that become a person.
sentences.chinese: 孩提時，她從未夢想過成爲一名著名的電視人。

sentences.english: Getting on the Olympic team is her prime objective ever since her childhood.
sentences.chinese: 從孩提時代起，參加奧運會集訓隊就是她的首要目標。

sentences.english: As a child, Wang junta never dreamed of becoming a famous TV personality.
sentences.chinese: 孩提時，王君燕從未夢想過成爲一名著名的電視人。

sentences.english: We used to play under the big tree when we were children.
sentences.chinese: 孩提時候，我們常常在那棵大樹下玩耍。

sentences.english: I used to keep sheep in my childhood.
They were like the eyes of the Virgin Mother when she was a child.
sentences.chinese: 她們的眼睛就象孩提時代的聖母。

sentences.english: Most of the time these are foods that you remember from your childhood.
sentences.chinese: 大多數情況下，你從孩提時代起就開始喫這些食物。

definition: to keep a record of events/record/to start to form memories (after one's infancy)
a girl's teenage years (idiom); maidenhood/a budding beauty
